data.title: The 20 Best Spiderman Villains
data.meta_description: Spiderman is one of the most famous superheroes that exist, being known even by people who do not even read comics, being an important figure in popular culture and having very distinctiveâ€¦
data.text:
Spiderman is one of the most famous superheroes that exist, being known even by people who do not even read comics, being an important figure in popular culture and having very distinctive characteristics such as his powers, but something also inevitable in his stories, just as with Batman, are his villains and here we tell you some of his villains who have tried to defeat the character on more than one occasion.

1 Doctor Octopus

Despite his criminal characteristics, Doctor Octopus had a relatively benevolent beginning. Son of a domineering mother and a gruff father Otto Octavius was a renowned doctor in nuclear physics, scientific researcher and inventor. Octavius designed a chest harness with four articulated, radiation-resistant titanium metal tentacles, endowed with great strength and precision, which he would use to manipulate radioactive elements from a distance.

Characteristics
